title: Live TV
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user launches a live MLB.TV stream
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a "CC" button in the player

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the "CC" button in the player
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the button should change from "Off" to "On"
And the closed captions should begin to show on the device

(Toggle back and forth to verify this works over and over)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user turns Closed Captions on/off
And then stops the stream and restarts another stream
Or the user closes the app and reopens it
(Make sure and force stop, don't just background app)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Closed caption setting the user had selected should be maintained betweens sessions

(ie. If the user had CC on, they should be on when the user starts another stream. 
If the user had CC off, the user should see not see them on the next feed launch.)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the "CC" button in the player
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the button should change from "Off" to "On"
And the closed captions should begin to show on the device

(Toggle back and forth to verify this works over and over)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user launches a video from a team video index
and taps the "CC" button in the player
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the button should change from "Off" to "On"
And the closed captions should begin to show on the device

(Toggle back and forth to verify this works over and over)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user launches a video from a team page video carousel
and taps the "CC" button in the player
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the button should change from "Off" to "On"
And the closed captions should begin to show on the device

(Toggle back and forth to verify this works over and over)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user turns Closed Captions on/off
And then stops the stream and restarts another stream
Or the user closes the app and reopens it
(Make sure and force stop, don't just background app)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Closed caption setting the user had selected should be maintained betweens sessions

(ie. If the user had CC on, they should be on when the user starts another stream. 
If the user had CC off, the user should see not see them on the next feed launch.)

title: Videos in News Articles
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
and the user navs to a news article with a video

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user launches the video within the news article
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a "CC" button in the player

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the "CC" button in the player
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the button should change from "Off" to "On"
And the closed captions should begin to show on the device

(Toggle back and forth to verify this works over and over)

title: Scoreboard Highlights
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has downloaded the AtBat Application
AND the user has navigated through on boarding

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN users log in as a paid user (TV or At Bat Premium)
AND the user navigates to the Scoreboard when a game is in progress
AND the user taps on the highlight in the expanded game cell
AND the user taps on the closed captioning button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the button should change from "Off" to "On"
And the closed captions should begin to show on the device

(Toggle back and forth to verify this works over and over)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is a Lite user
AND the user navigates to the Scoreboard with a game in Progress
AND the user taps on the expanded game cell
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should not see highlights display

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN users is as a Lite or Paid user
AND the user navigates to the Scoreboard with a game in the Final state
AND the user taps on the expanded game cell
AND the user taps on the closed captioning button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the button should change from "Off" to "On"
And the closed captions should begin to show on the device

(Toggle back and forth to verify this works over and over)

title: Gameday Highlights
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has downloaded the AtBat Application
AND the user has navigated through on boarding

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN users log in as a paid user (TV or At Bat Premium)
AND the user navigates to the highlights section in Gameday with a game in progress
AND the user taps on a highlight
AND the user taps on the closed captioning button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the button should change from "Off" to "On"
And the closed captions should begin to show on the device

(Toggle back and forth to verify this works over and over)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is a Lite user
AND the user navigates to the highlights section in Gameday with a game in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be pushed to the At Bat Paywall

title: MLB Network
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has downloaded the AtBat application
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on the hamburger button
AND taps on the MLB Network tab
AND the user authenticates with a TV Provider OR the user logged in with a MLB.TV account
AND the user taps on the close captioning button
custom_expected:
THEN the button should change from "Off" to "On"
And the closed captions should begin to show on the device

(Toggle back and forth to verify this works over and over)

title: Adhoc
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has downloaded AtBat

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user maps the banners URL to the attached file
AND the user has authenticated with a MLB.TV account
AND the user has received an in application banner (Team Page & Scores Tab)
AND the user taps on the banner
AND the user taps on the close captioning button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the button should change from "Off" to "On"
And the closed captions should begin to show on the device

(Toggle back and forth to verify this works over and over)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user maps the banners URL to the attached file
AND the user has authenticated with a Premium or a Lite account
AND the user has received an in application banner (Team Page & Scores Tab)
AND the user taps on the banner
AND the user taps on the close captioning button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the button should change from "Off" to "On"
And the closed captions should begin to show on the device

(Toggle back and forth to verify this works over and over)

title: Default CC Option
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has downloaded the AtBat application
custom_steps: When the user launches video that supports Closed Captioning
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the CC button available
AND the CC should be defaulted to off
